ygData.subject: RE: Re: Aqualung Sales
ygData.msgSnippet: The Aqualung has charges of breath of the dead .  Just look at the pics on the tinkering site.  The rebreather is the one that has a perpetual enduring breath
ygData.messageBody:
The Aqualung has charges of "breath of the dead". Just look at the pics on
the tinkering site. The rebreather is the one that has a perpetual enduring
breath effect. Breath of the dead is a self only necro spell. Obviously
there so that you don't use the charges to cast the effect on somebody else.
I'm not sure what the difference is in duration (having never played a necro
past 7th) but it's quite possible it's longer than enduring breath.

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Rider <baladoreq@...>

Also about buying 50 enduring breath potions,
supposedly the charges in the aqualung last much
longer then enduring breath
